## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G26540](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G26540)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RGFR3, RGI3</u>
- **Gene Name:** RGF1 INSENSITIVE 3
- **Description:**   Leucine-rich repeat receptor-like protein kinase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2131518
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
